Sentencas: Alloys protected from corrosion by a chromia scale and LaCrO3-based perovskites are used as materials for the interconnect of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Chromium vapor species over solid oxide fuel cell interconnect materials and their potential for degradation processes

Sentencas: The chromium vaporization of these materials was studied by thermochemical modeling.
Titulo: Chromium vapor species over solid oxide fuel cell interconnect materials and their potential for degradation processes

Sentencas: Partial pressures of the vaporizing species were determined for different O-2 and H2O concentrations in the oxidizing gas.
Titulo: Chromium vapor species over solid oxide fuel cell interconnect materials and their potential for degradation processes

Sentencas: CrO2(OH)(2)(g) and CrO3(g) are the most abundant species in air with and without humidity, respectively.
Titulo: Chromium vapor species over solid oxide fuel cell interconnect materials and their potential for degradation processes

Sentencas: The potential of the Cr-containing vapor species for the degradation of the electrical properties of an SOFC was analyzed by thermodynamic computations.
Titulo: Chromium vapor species over solid oxide fuel cell interconnect materials and their potential for degradation processes

Sentencas: The electrochemical reduction of the Cr-containing vapor species at the cathode/electrolyte/gas phase boundary can lead to polarization losses.
Titulo: Chromium vapor species over solid oxide fuel cell interconnect materials and their potential for degradation processes
